verses.name: Luke 23:19
verses.text: (Who for a certain sedition made in the city, and for murder, was cast into prison.)

verses.name: Luke 23:20
verses.text: Pilate therefore, willing to release Jesus, spake again to them.

verses.name: Luke 23:21
verses.text: But they cried, saying, Crucify him, crucify him.

verses.name: Luke 23:22
verses.text: And he said unto them the third time, Why, what evil hath he done? I have found no cause of death in him: I will therefore chastise him, and let him go.

verses.name: Luke 23:23
verses.text: And they were instant with loud voices, requiring that he might be crucified. And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed.
